data.title: Last Day to Help Larissa Leon Win a $10,000 Duck Tape Scholarship
data.meta_description: The top five ladies and gentlemen have been competing for a scholarship and today, July 14th, 2021 is the last day to get your votes in so please do so and share
data.text:
When you're young the World is truly your oyster. The energy level is high, you haven't experienced enough to feel jaded or disheartened, I hope, and your passions overflow. Larissa Leon is a perfect example of someone who fell in love with an item and began to transform it into her favorite things. That item just so happened to be Duck tape.

Her Childhood Passion

It's was back when tape starting coming out with bold patterns and bright colors. She was busy making wallets, purses, backpacks, and more. Training without realizing for the day she could create a tape piece and compete for a $10,000 scholarship! Talk about thinking outside the box!

Places to Munch

Why She's My Women Crush Wednesday

Not only is Larissa Leon a talented, well-spoken junior from Sunnyside High School. She is also a positive influence on those around her. In my first interview with her, she mentioned how if she didn't make the top 10 that wasn't going to stop her from creating OR voting! She said, "If I don't make it I still want people to go pick their favorite and vote! Someone is still going to win and everyone worked so hard." She also mentioned how important it was to fill out all kinds of scholarships. If you're not a big fan of essay writing like Larissa, she mentioned there are scholarships out there for just about everything. Just apply because you never know!

Today is the Final Day to Vote

This is it! We soon will find out who the top female Duck Tape champion is so please CLICK HERE and spread the word to all your friends and family. We are allowed to vote once a day so make it count!

Larissa Leon's Duck Tape Creation

LOOK: The most famous actress born the same year as you

Many of the actresses in this story not only made a name for themselves through their collection of iconic performances, but also through the selfless, philanthropic nature with which many of them approached their stardom. In an age of flipping the script on societal norms, many of these actresses are using their voices and platforms to be advocates for those who are otherwise unheard.
